title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The bug report does not provide an observed behavior.
EB: Input a new Date() as content for three items. Save and preview. The expected result is that all three items should show the same format. The actual result is that the data and text item show the same format, but the dynamic text item shows a different format.
SR: The bug report is missing the steps to reproduce the issue. Please provide the exact steps to replicate the problem.
